name: N3 (NomadAA)
description:
Play in Fullscreen for best experience.

The controls for this template are: 

- Arrow keys to Move

- Space bar to Jump

- Mash Space to wall-jump/wall-climb on differently colored walls (Tip: don't move left or right while wall- climbing)

- Press Escape to unpause and start playing!

Good luck, have fun!
